name: Timothy deluxe (boss rush) (the demo)
description:
This is a demo edition to that

you cannot go to the next boss because this version is a demo

Note: This game is a boss rush game (please tell timothy games to make a full level games)

Controls:

Arrows or wasd to move

up or w to jump

Space to shoot

E to use big shot (25 energy)

Q to use bomb (max energy)

F to dash (1 energy)

R to shield (1 energy)

Credits:

timothy's testing games - tester

drakewayne - creator
